mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id AS boardId, s.students_id AS studentsId, s.students_name AS studentsName, b.title, b.content, b.cnt, IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(b.update_at,'%Y-%m-%d'),'-')AS updateAt, DATE_FORMAT(b.create_at,'%Y-%m-%d') AS createAt FROM board AS b INNER JOIN students AS s ON b.students_id = s.students_id

mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, update_at = now() WHERE board_id = #{boardId}

SELECT b.board_id AS boardId, s.students_id AS studentsId, s.students_name AS studentsName, b.title, b.content, IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(b.update_at,'%Y-%m-%d'),'-') AS updateAt, DATE_FORMAT(b.create_at,'%Y-%m-%d') AS createAt, b.cnt FROM board AS b INNER JOIN students AS s ON b.students_id = s.students_id WHERE s.students_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{studentsName},'%')
